contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Trial by Fire: Live in Leningrad | Type = live | Artist = [[Yngwie Malmsteen]] | Cover = YngwieJMalmsteen-TrialByFire.jpg | Released = {{Start date|1989}}<ref name=allmusic>Taylor, Robert. [http://www.allmusic.com/album/trial-by-fire-live-in-leningrad-mw0000206162 "Trial by Fire: Live in Leningrad - Yngwie Malmsteen"]. ''[[AllMusic]]''. [[Rovi Corporation]]. Retrieved 2012-11-24.</ref> | Recorded = Leningrad SKK Stadium in [[Saint Petersburg|Saint Petersburg, Russia]] | Genre = [[Neo-classical metal]], [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]], [[instrumental rock]] | Length = {{Duration|m=66|s=30}} | Label = [[Polydor Records|Polydor]] | Producer = Yngwie Malmsteen | Last album = ''[[Odyssey (Yngwie Malmsteen album)|Odyssey]]''<br>(1988) | This album = '''''Trial by Fire: Live in Leningrad'''''<br>(1989) | Next album = ''[[Eclipse (Yngwie Malmsteen album)|Eclipse]]''<br>(1990) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[AllMusic]] | rev1score = {{Rating|1.5|5}}<ref name=allmusic/> }} '''''Trial by Fire: Live in Leningrad''''' is the first live album by guitarist [[Yngwie Malmsteen]], released in 1989 through [[Polydor Records]]. It reached #128 on that year's [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] chart and remained charted for eight weeks.<ref name=billboard>[{{BillboardURLbyName|artist=yngwie malmsteen|chart=all}} "Trial by Fire: Live in Leningrad - Yngwie Malmsteen"]. ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]''. Retrieved 2012-11-24.</ref> A video of the concert was released in the same year through [[PolyGram|PolyGram Video]] (VHS)<ref>[http://www.metal-archives.com/albums/Yngwie_J._Malmsteen/Live_in_Leningrad%3A_Trial_by_Fire/11809 "Yngwie J. Malmsteen - Live in Leningrad: Trial by Fire"]. [[Encyclopaedia Metallum]]. 2011-10-24. Retrieved 2012-11-24.</ref> and reissued on December 12, 2006 through [[Universal Music Group|Universal Music]] (DVD).<ref>[http://www.amazon.com/Trial-By-Fire-Live-Leningrad/dp/B000JMJRS0 "Trial By Fire: Live in Leningrad 89"]. [[Amazon.com|Amazon]]. Retrieved 2012-11-24.</ref> ==Track listing== {{Track listing | lyrics_credits = yes | music_credits = yes | title1 = Liar | lyrics1 = Yngwie Malmsteen | music1 = Malmsteen | length1 = 3:56 | title2 = Queen in Love | lyrics2 = Malmsteen | music2 = Malmsteen | length2 = 3:55 | title3 = Deja Vu | lyrics3 = [[Joe Lynn Turner]] | music3 = Malmsteen | length3 = 4:05 | title4 = Far Beyond the Sun | lyrics4 = (instrumental) | music4 = Malmsteen | length4 = 8:17 | title5 = Heaven Tonight | lyrics5 = Turner | music5 = Malmsteen | length5 = 4:27 | title6 = Dreaming (Tell Me) | lyrics6 = Turner | music6 = Malmsteen | length6 = 6:34 | title7 = You Don't Remember, I'll Never Forget | lyrics7 = Malmsteen | music7 = Malmsteen | length7 = 6:04 | title8 = Guitar Solo (Trilogy Suite Op: 5/Spasebo Blues) | lyrics8 = (instrumental) | music8 = Malmsteen | length8 = 10:16 | title9 = Crystal Ball | lyrics9 = Turner | music9 = Malmsteen | length9 = 6:03 | title10 = Black Star | lyrics10 = (instrumental) | music10 = Malmsteen | length10 = 6:09 | title11 = [[Spanish Castle Magic|Spanish Castle Magic (LP Version)]] | lyrics11 = [[Jimi Hendrix]] | music11 = Hendrix | length11 = 6:44 | total_length = 66:30 }} ==Personnel== *[[Yngwie Malmsteen]] – [[singing|vocals]] (track 11), [[guitar]], [[bass pedals]], [[backing vocalist|background vocals]] [[audio mixing (recorded music)|mixing]], [[record producer|production]] *[[Joe Lynn Turner]] – vocals (tracks 1–3, 5–7, 9, 11) *[[Jens Johansson]] – [[keyboard instrument|keyboard]] *[[Anders Johansson]] – [[drum kit|drums]] *[[Barry Dunaway]] – [[bassline|bass]], background vocals *[[Tony Platt]] – [[audio engineering|engineering]] *Mark Dearnley – mixing *Matthew Budd – mixing *[[Howie Weinberg]] – [[audio mastering|mastering]] ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Chart !! Position |- |1989 |[[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] |align="center"|128<ref name=billboard/> |} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.guitar9.com/trialbyfire.html In Review: Yngwie J. Malmsteen "Trial By Fire: Live In Leningrad"] at Guitar Nine Records {{Yngwie Malmsteen}} [[Category:Yngwie Malmsteen live albums]] [[Category:1989 live albums]] [[Category:Polydor Records live albums]]
